mapper.select: select b.* from (select rownum as rm, a.* from ( select * from nandal_user order by usercode) a)b where b.rm>=#{startRow} and b.rm <=#{endRow}

SELECT count(*) FROM nandal_review_board
where ${searchKey} LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
where subject LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'

select b.*, u.nickname from (select rownum as rm, a.* from ( select * from nandal_review_board
WHERE ${searchKey} LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
WHERE subject LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%' OR content LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
order by ref desc, re_step asc) a)b left join nandal_user u on b.writer=u.usercode
where b.rm>=#{startRow} and b.rm <=#{endRow}
order by ref desc, re_step asc
